data_sources.description: Contains training data with features and target variable.

data_variables.name: train_df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the training data read from a CSV file.

data_variables.name: test_df
data_variables.description: DataFrame generated for predictions, created from the function generate_test_df.

data_variables.name: nn_preds
data_variables.description: Predictions generated from the neural network model.

data_variables.name: lgb_preds
data_variables.description: Predictions generated from the LightGBM model.

data_flow.creation: Read from CSV file using pd.read_csv.
data_flow.flow: Used for training a tabular neural network and LightGBM model.

data_flow.creation: Generated within the pred_tabular_nn function using the train_df and test_df.
data_flow.flow: Used to generate final target values for test_df.

data_flow.creation: Generated within the pred_lgb function using the test_df.
data_flow.flow: Used to generate final target values for test_df.
